comments: It is hard for me to give her an accurate review since she was replaced about 3 weeks into the semester. I think somebody must have complained about her because of a possible language barrier. I hope she didn\'t get fired, she seemed nice.

Very thick accent and speaks quitely so its hard to understand her. Has a hard time understanding english so she doesn\'t answer questions very clearly. she tells you to refer to the book which she never uses. I would switch to a different class.
very hard to understand! buying a book is a waist of money since she just writes everything down from the book...homework is online, so just buy a course compass pass and don\'t bother with the book.
Hard to understand at times. I thought the class was harder than it really was apparently. I got a better grade than I thought I would.
